dict.acceptation: 永久（性）的，永恒的，不变的，耐久的，持久的，经久的；稳定的；常务的，常设的；

sent.orig: Permanent teachers and students to reach a permanent agreement, that is, a good friend of permanent!
sent.trans: 永久的教师和永久的学生达到默契了，就是永久的好朋友！

sent.orig: Contractor is always more than permanent, and they always work permanent.
sent.trans: 约聘人员超过固定职员，而且更有可能长期做下去。

sent.orig: Scope: Distribution AG permanent bike production of a permanent brand products and spare partsDistributionparts.
sent.trans: 经营范围：经销永久自行车股份公司生产的永久品牌产品及零配件。

sent.orig: We should seek both temporary and permanent solutions to the problems, with emphasis on permanent solutions.
There is no permanent friend or enemy, and there is only permanent interest.
sent.trans: 没有永远的朋友或敌人，只有永远的利益。
